name: travel_delays
rows: Moving roadwork on I-84 eastbound between 5 miles west of Exit 17: PA 191 - HAMLIN/NEWFOUNDLAND and .4 miles west of Exit : NY Line. All lanes now open.
Moving roadwork on I-84 westbound between .4 miles west of Exit : NY Line and 5 miles east of Exit 8: PA 247/PA 348 - MT COBB. All lanes now open.
Multi vehicle crash on I-81 southbound 1.2 miles north of Exit 85: PA 934 - ANNVILLE/FT INDIANTOWN GAP. There is a lane restriction.
BOAL AV / SOUTH ATHERTON ST / NORTH ATHERTON ST
Multi vehicle crash on BOAL AV / SOUTH ATHERTON ST / NORTH ATHERTON ST eastbound between CALDER WY and BEAVER AV. All lanes now open.
Crash on US 6 both directions between PEET ST and EULALIA ST. There is a lane restriction.
Debris on roadway on HARBISON AV / ARAMINGO AV both directions at Exit: I-95 SOUTH - DELAWARE EXPRESSWAY. There is a ramp restriction.
Ramp from I-476 N to PA 63 (Exit 31 A)
Incident on Ramp from I-476 N to PA 63 (Exit 31 A). Expect delays.
Crash on I-79 northbound at Exit 34: I-70 EAST - NEW STANTON. There is a ramp closure.
Rubbernecking on I-81 northbound 1.5 miles north of Exit 85B: FORT INDIANTOWN GAP. There is a traffic disruption.
Utility work on MCKNIGHT RD / EVERGREEN RD northbound at SIEBERT RD. There is a lane restriction.
Downed tree in wires on JACKS MOUNTAIN RD / WILLS RD both directions between (CENTRE County Line)+ LITTLE KANSAS RD, KANSAS RD and FRONT MOUNTAIN RD. All lanes closed.
I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD
Roadwork on I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD both directions between Exit: BEDFORD AV /+ MARIO LEMIEUX PL and Exit: HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE both directions between Exit: MAZEROSKI WY /+ PNC PARK/HEINZ FIELD and Exit: LC TO PERRY HW. All lanes closed.
Flooding on SR 1004 SH both directions between POSEYTOWN RD, SCENIC RD and 1 miles EAST of POSEYTOWN RD, SCENIC RD. All lanes closed.
Downed utility on MARTINS CREEK BELVIDER HW both directions between SR 0611 SH and MOUNT PLEASANT RD. All lanes closed.
LITTLE HICKORY RD / NEBRASKA RD / GUITONVILLE RD
Flooding on LITTLE HICKORY RD / NEBRASKA RD / GUITONVILLE RD both directions between GERMAN HILL RD and SR 3005 SAGE RD. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on PA 130 westbound 0 miles WEST of CEDAR ST. There is a lane restriction.
Flooding on PA 381 both directions between CLUB STABLE RD and LINCOLN HW. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on I-80 eastbound between .9 miles east of Exit 53: PA 338 - KNOX and .5 miles east of Exit : WEIGH STATION EAST RD. There is a shoulder closed.
Road work on I-76 East. Shoulders are closed.
Flooding on LINGLE AV both directions between (LANCASTER County Line)+ NORTHSIDE DR and OATFIELD LN. All lanes closed.
Utility work on I-70 westbound at Exit: WELCOME CENTER. There is a ramp closure.
Other incident on I-79 northbound at Exit: REST AREA/WEIGH STATION. There is a ramp restriction.
Flooding on PA 234 both directions at S SALEM CHURCH RD. There is a traffic disruption.
ART MUSEUM CR / ARCH ST / KELLY DR / BENJAMIN FRANKLIN PY
Roadwork on ART MUSEUM CR / ARCH ST / KELLY DR / BENJAMIN FRANKLIN PY southbound between TWENTIETH ST and PHILA-BEN FRANKLIN, RACE ST. There is a lane restriction.
